name: Tanmatsuban HD
description:
Tanmatsuban (端末番) is back and better than ever! Puzzle your way through 60 hand-crafted levels that will put your block-pushing skills to the test. Each new hub area layers a new mechanic onto the traditional block-pushing puzzle formula, culminating in some truly brain-busting puzzles.

Move: Arrow keys or WASD
Undo: Backspace
Reset: R
Quit: Esc
